content: Well, tell me how will you get admission in a government school?

To get admission in a government school in Qatar, you can use the New Student Registration Service provided by the Ministry of Education and Higher Education [doc1]. This service is for registering students in government schools for the next academic year. The service is available for Qatari children, children of Qatari women, children of citizens of the countries of the Cooperation Council for the Arab States of the Gulf, non-Qatari children working in ministries, other government agencies, public authorities and institutions, and children of Qatari nationals who work in fraternal private associations and institutions [doc1]. To use the service, you need to log in with a username and password given by the Ministry of Education and Higher Education and used in other ministry systems, such as the e-learning system [doc1]. If you don't have an account, you can create a new one by clicking on the "Register a new account" link on the login page [doc1]. After logging in, you can select
